languages.text: Кибелла долго бродит средь останков, прежде чем сообщает, что чувствует присутствие неупокоенных душ. По ее словам, они гневятся, мечутся в ужасе и проклинают своих убийц, раз за разом переживая миг смерти.

Kibellah wanders among the remains for a long time before announcing that she senses the presence of the departed souls. She says that they are angry, terrified and cursing their killers, reliving the moment of death over and over again.
languages.original_text: Кибелла долго бродит средь останков, прежде чем сообщает, что чувствует присутствие неупокоенных душ. По ее словам, они гневятся, мечутся в ужасе и проклинают своих убийц, раз за разом переживая миг смерти.

languages.text: Kibellah wandert lange Zeit durch die Überreste, ehe sie erklärt, sie würde die Präsenz der gefallenen Seelen spüren. Sie sagt, sie seien wütend, verängstigt und würden ihre Mörder verfluchen und den Augenblick ihres Todes immer wieder aufs Neue durchleben.
languages.original_text: Kibellah wanders among the remains for a long time before announcing that she senses the presence of the departed souls. She says that they are angry, terrified and cursing their killers, reliving the moment of death over and over again.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah wandert lange Zeit durch die Überreste, ehe sie erklärt, sie würde die Präsenz der gefallenen Seelen spüren. Sie sagt, sie seien wütend, verängstigt und würden ihre Mörder verfluchen und den Augenblick ihres Todes immer wieder aufs Neue durchleben.

languages.text: Kibellah erre longuement parmi les cadavres avant d'annoncer qu'elle perçoit la présence des âmes des défunts. À l'en croire, elles sont furieuses, terrifiées, et elles maudissent leurs assassins tandis qu'elles revivent encore et encore leurs derniers instants.
languages.original_text: Kibellah wanders among the remains for a long time before announcing that she senses the presence of the departed souls. She says that they are angry, terrified and cursing their killers, reliving the moment of death over and over again.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah erre longuement parmi les cadavres avant d'annoncer qu'elle perçoit la présence des âmes des défunts. À l'en croire, elles sont furieuses, terrifiées, et elles maudissent leurs assassins tandis qu'elles revivent encore et encore leurs derniers instants.

languages.text: Kibellah recorre los restos un largo tiempo antes de anunciar que siente la presencia de las almas de los caídos. Según dice, están furiosas y aterradas y maldicen a quienes causaron su muerte, momento que experimentan una y otra vez.
languages.original_text: Kibellah wanders among the remains for a long time before announcing that she senses the presence of the departed souls. She says that they are angry, terrified and cursing their killers, reliving the moment of death over and over again.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah recorre los restos un largo tiempo antes de anunciar que siente la presencia de las almas de los caídos. Según dice, están furiosas y aterradas y maldicen a quienes causaron su muerte, momento que experimentan una y otra vez.

languages.text: キベラは長い間遺体の中を歩き回ってから、旅立った魂の存在を感じると告げた。彼女によると、彼らは怒り、怯え、自身を殺害したものを呪っており、死の瞬間を何度も何度も繰り返しているとのことだ。
languages.original_text: Kibellah wanders among the remains for a long time before announcing that she senses the presence of the departed souls. She says that they are angry, terrified and cursing their killers, reliving the moment of death over and over again.

traits.locale_text: キベラは長い間遺体の中を歩き回ってから、旅立った魂の存在を感じると告げた。彼女によると、彼らは怒り、怯え、自身を殺害したものを呪っており、死の瞬間を何度も何度も繰り返しているとのことだ。

languages.text: 绮贝菈在遗骸之中徘徊了很久，说她感觉到了那些死者的灵魂。她说，那些死者充满了愤怒与恐惧，诅咒着杀害他们的凶手，一遍又一遍地不断重温死亡的那一刻。
languages.original_text: Kibellah wanders among the remains for a long time before announcing that she senses the presence of the departed souls. She says that they are angry, terrified and cursing their killers, reliving the moment of death over and over again.

traits.locale_text: 绮贝菈在遗骸之中徘徊了很久，说她感觉到了那些死者的灵魂。她说，那些死者充满了愤怒与恐惧，诅咒着杀害他们的凶手，一遍又一遍地不断重温死亡的那一刻。

languages.text: Kibellah, uzun bir süre kalıntıların arasında dolaştıktan sonra ölen ruhlarını varlığını hissettiğini açıklıyor. Ruhların öfkeli olduğunu, dehşete düştüğünü ve katillerini lanetleyip ölüm anlarını tekrar tekrar yaşadıklarını aktarıyor.
languages.original_text: Kibellah wanders among the remains for a long time before announcing that she senses the presence of the departed souls. She says that they are angry, terrified and cursing their killers, reliving the moment of death over and over again.
